meta.label: Bulk load from S3
meta.description: This Plugin allows a user to bulk load data stored in S3 (in a DSS S3 Managed Dataset) to a Snowflake table.
meta.author: Dataiku

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output Dataset
outputRoles.description: Output DSS Dataset that will be stored in Snowflake

params.name: aws_access_key
params.label: AWS Access Key
params.description: Leave empty if it is defined as a project variable

params.name: aws_secret_key
params.label: AWS Secret Key
params.description: Leave empty if it is defined as a project variable
